categories.description: Categories. Define custom WebSocket events here. You can use dots in category names. Must start with a lower case letter.

paramList.description: Parameters passed within a topic. E.g. the topic name myGroupName.myCustomName.Account.someId. This makes a topic name unique for a specific record. For global events, omit this parameter.

accessCheckCommand.description: A console command that will be used to check whether a topic is allowed for a user when they attempting to subscribe. Patameter placeholders starts with the colon :. The userId parameter contains a user ID. If access checking is not needed, omit this parameter.

messagers.description: Provides the ability to implement other messagers rather than the default ZeroMQ. E.g. RabbitMQ.
